title: HELP
body: I can't buy a champ I want from the store. How do I fix that?

replies.body:
If this is because your IP balance doesn't look correct or is greyed out, this is likely caused by a bug from the backend responsible for reporting your IP values. You can try a workaround that has resolved this for some players by launching directly to the *Legacy Client* and try purchasing using the store on this client. Below is a screenshot showing where you can access the Legacy Client from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this worked for you.
